list.headline: Custom Spells!
list.leftTextBlock: In the upper part of the page you have the create spell button
list.rightTextBlock: In the lower part of the page you will find the list of all the spells you created or downloaded from the market

list.headline: Create Spell
list.leftTextBlock: After pressing the create spell button a popup will appear
list.rightTextBlock: Just fill all the fields with your homebrew spell (if this is your first spell please read online on how to create spells currently)

list.headline: Edit Spell
list.leftTextBlock: You can edit all the spells you created and the ones you downloaded from the market
list.rightTextBlock: Just open a spell from the list and hit the edit button

list.headline: Marketplace
list.leftTextBlock: After finishing the spell creation you ill have the option to upload it to the market
list.rightTextBlock: You can upload the spell after picking it from the existing spells list in the bottom of the page

list.headline: Ready to create some spells?
list.leftTextBlock: create and share on the market
list.rightTextBlock: Explore the vast universe of imagination!
